description_long: You are in a room. This is the long form of it not being very interesting.
description_short: You are in a room. It's not very interesting.
description_lowlight: The room is dimly lit. It's not very interesting.
description_dark: It's so dark you can't see your hand in front of your face.

description_long: Cobwebs drape along sides of the room clinging to cracks in the stonework and several rows of shackles lining the wall.
You briefly wonder what this room used to be used for, but decide that's better left to the imagination.
description_short: You are in a room. It's not very interesting.
description_lowlight: The room is dimly lit. It's not very interesting.
description_dark: It's so dark you can't see your hand in front of your face.

description_long: This room seems a little brighter than others.
As you glance upward, you can see bits of the outside sky poking in.
In the cracks in the cobblestones below you, you see tiny clumps of moss making the most of this light.
description_short: You are in a room. It's not very interesting.
description_lowlight: The room is dimly lit. It's not very interesting.
description_dark: It's so dark you can't see your hand in front of your face.

description_long: A dank scent fills this room.
The walls appear to have a light coating of algae on them, probably from the increased moisture.
You hear a faint dripping sound that you soon realize is coming from a rusted water pump in the corner
You're not sure what the implications of drinking water out of a rusty pump in a magical labryth are, but in a pinch, you could probably fill a container here.
description_short: You are in a room. It's not very interesting.
description_lowlight: The room is dimly lit. It's not very interesting.
description_dark: It's so dark you can't see your hand in front of your face.

description_long: You are in a room.
Along one wall, you see a humanoid skeleton slumped over, dressed in brown robes, but severely dried out.
It seems to have been here for quite some time.
Clutched in its bony fingers is a dusty tome.
description_short: You are in a room. It's not very interesting.
description_lowlight: The room is dimly lit. It's not very interesting.
description_dark: It's so dark you can't see your hand in front of your face.

description_long: This room doesn't seem to fit in at all with the others.
Instead of the usual dungeon-esque aesthetic, this looks like someone's bedroom.
A green woolen carpet covers most of the floor, with a neatly made four-poster bed in the center.
There appears to be a small sitting area on the side of the bed with a serving platter atop it.
But who would want to stay in a room in a dungeon?
description_short: You are in a room. It's not very interesting.
description_lowlight: The room is dimly lit. It's not very interesting.
description_dark: It's so dark you can't see your hand in front of your face.

description_long: You are in a room.
In a corner sits a workstation with round wooden table, some flasks and bowls, and a tiny stone fire pit set into its center.
It appears to be some sort of alchemy lab.
It's super interesting
